articles.description: BMW Motorrad has launched the R 1300 GS, its latest flagship adventure motorcycle in India. The asking price starts from Rs. 20,95,00 (ex-showroom, Delhi).
articles.content:
- Available in four variants
- Powered by a 1,300cc, liquid-cooled, boxer engine
- The variants differ in terms of colours, features and equipment
